game.name: Robodies: Machine IS NOT Learning
game.categories: Single-player, Tracked Controller Support, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Robodies: Machine IS NOT Learning is a chaotic VR classroom sim where you teach misbehaving AI robots by answering demands, throwing chalk, and slapping sense into them—before they glitch out or start fights!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Robodies: Machine IS NOT Learning is a chaotic VR classroom sim where you teach misbehaving AI robots by answering demands, throwing chalk, and slapping sense into them—before they glitch out or start fights!
